title: Exquisite Diamond Floral Cascade Haaram with Emerald & Ruby Accents
features: Floral cascade design with intricate diamond detailing. The necklace features a central emerald-studded pendant and a larger, lower pendant with a ruby centerpiece. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of grace. The flexible gold chain ensures comfortable wear. Design inspired by traditional Addigai style.
colors: Cream (Pearls). A traditional tricolor combination often seen in South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: and high-end social events. Ideal for brides and women seeking a statement piece.
description: A timeless masterpiece blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and precious gemstones ensure lasting brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster. This Haaram is a symbol of prosperity, beauty, and cultural heritage, making it a cherished heirloom.
